item.title: Painkiller Jane - The 22 Brides

Painkiller Jane: The 22 Brides

Romance and chaos is in the air as Jane is joined by a group of mercenary assassins called THE 22 BRIDES as they take down a group of terrorists causing chaos in NYC.

item.title: Painkiller Jane The Price of Freedom
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Painkiller Jane: The Price of Freedom

PAINKILLER JANE is back in action as we follow her on an adrenaline filled adventure protecting a Saudi Arabian princess on her visit to the New York City. It seems a number of people want her dead and the only thing between them and her royal highness is our gun toting, out of control, Painkiller Jane.

item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Sex and Violence

SEX AND VIOLENCE volume 1 is a 64 page graphic novel about crime, lust and

redemption split into two distinctively different stories sharing similar themes.

item.title: Weapon of God
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Weapon of God

Weapon of God is a graphic novel about a man chosen by the church to fight the ultimate evil. Weapon Of God sees Palmiotti and Gray re-teaming with their Random Acts of Violence artist Giancarlo Caracuzzo to document the story of a murderous psychopath named Apollyon and the secret weapon that the Catholic Church unveils to stop him.
